name: Tau Defense
description:
You build towers to defend against enemy that's stealing your Qi. Tau Defense starts with this simple concept and develops into meticulous strategy game. Any battle map can be defended in multiple ways, achieving different goals. After each gameplay you will see these aspects of the battle in the form of graphs. Each battle has multiple challenges that will nudge you to think creatively and adapt your tactics to win new trophies.



Your tactics can be reviewed in the form of many graphs.


Changes to map topology require new adaptations of your strategy


Tile propagation mechanism adds yet another variation to the battle map, making you think creatively
